sql.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wtrlvl ( _id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, UID VARCHAR(50), TANK_NAME VARCHAR(50), SCALE_M VARCHAR(9), SCALE_C VARCHAR(9), DP VARCHAR(4), UNIT VARCHAR(15) )
INSERT INTO wtrlvl (UID, TANK_NAME, SCALE_M, SCALE_C, DP, UNIT) VALUES('V1','Test Sensor LVT','1','0','25','CM')
INSERT INTO wtrlvl (UID, TANK_NAME, SCALE_M, SCALE_C, DP, UNIT) VALUES('V2','Test Sensor Gauge','1','0','20','MM')
